channel.title: Can someone help me!
channel.description: I need help adding dialogue please someone else. add me skype Brodiehenawaylogan or message me for teamview thanks

item.title: Can someone help me!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Ok this is just an example but it goes like this. Iâ€™m assuming that you are using PI
First open dialoguehandler.java
and put in this code:

case DIALOGUENUMBERHERE://Here you Can just put a simple number, like 171 for example so it would be case 171: sendNpcChat4("First Line of text here", "Second line of text here", "Third Line of text here", "Fourth Line of text here", c.talkingNpc, "NPCNAMEHERE"); c.nextChat = 0; break;
That Creates the dialogue. You Still need to apply it to an NPC.
so go to actionhandler.java and find

case 8275: if (c.slayerTask <= 0) { c.getDH().sendDialogues(11,npcType); } else { c.getDH().sendDialogues(13,npcType); } break;
Under that put this:
case NPCIDHERE: c.getDH().sendDialogues(DIALOGUENUMBERHERE,npcType); break;
That will make it so when you click on the npc, it sends the dialogues over

Read full topic
